lyrics.text: days are going and passing by
and i'm living in the torment alone
And there is nothing but your picture in front of me
since you got away in one second
the world has no taste anymore
i no longer feel my days
it's against my will and i have nothing to do about
and your being absent for my eyes
and where are you my eyes light
who will console me while you're gone
there is nothing left to make me happy
but your separaton has broken me down
you always come to me in my dreams
and i tell you i want you to pray for me
may god make patient while you're gone
it's against my will and i have nothing to do about
and your being absent for my eyes
and where are you my eyes light
who will console me while you're gone
and where are you my eyes light
who will console me while you're gone
nor that the fact that i won't be happy
Men youm manta b3dt f sanya
a3la tool fe el a7lam batgeeni
من يوم ما انت بعدت ف ثانية
From this night ,I will live all my rest life for you
And I can do anything for your eyes
Come close to me ,my eyes calling you with eagerness
Its impossible to live my life without you
Whenever you are near to me ,I will not need anything else
Why you are asking me to dream again?
All that I was dreaming of ,I found them in you
Your eye looking ,your gentleness ,and your hand’s touching
Your fearing on me ,your eagerness ,God bless you
If it was on my hand ,I hope I live 2 lifes with you
Its not enough to live one life for your love
And whats the life without your smile? And your approval
And without I feel your eagerness when I meet you
Whenever you are near to me ,I will not need anything else
Why you are asking me to dream again?
All that I was dreaming of ,I found them in you
Your eye looking ,your gentleness ,and your hand’s touching
Your fearing on me ,your eagerness ,God bless you
انا من الليلة دي العمر كله هعيشه ليك
وحقدر اعمل اي حاجة عشان عينيك
قرب عيوني بشوق يا غالي بتناديك
انا مستحيل اعيش حياتي الا بيك
انا كل حاجة حلمت بيها لقيتها فيك
دا مش كفاية في عمري بس
والدنيا ايه غير ضحكتك لية ورضاك
غير اني احس بلهفتك لحظة لقاك
انا كل حاجة حلمت بيها لقيتها فيك
how do i describe all i'm dreaming of
he became mine,i own him and my heart lived in him
no matter what happens,i'll and die for you
my heart and soul are your hands proprety
and living my life for you
even if your away from me
and i always wish to be with you
you're passion inside me is growing day after day
what do i desrcibe,where do i find the words?
if i tell you that i'll describe you ,with what will i start
everything in you,your voice,and the charm of your eyes
i no longer know what attaches me and hangs my heart to you
my heart and soul are your hands proprety
and living my life for you
even if your away from me
and i always wish to be with you
you're passion inside me is growing day after day
You came on my mind few days ago
I said that I should ask where are you now
And by the way (speech between me and you)
Send my regards to both of your eyes
He will not be able to forget the most precious one
No ,don’t say that you forgot me
I always hope to be with you
And even if I’m busy ,I cannot forget you one day
But the days (the life) is taking me ,as it is taking you (making us busy)
You came on my mind frequently ,not once nor two times
When I’m closing my eyes ,I just remember our previous days and our story
I said to you good evening ,I miss your days ,oh if you come back to me again
I’m now hoping if a place could gather us
i swear, i've loved, and my mind has rested/become happy/not worried
i saw you, and i dont know what happened to me
between a day and a night, you've turned me around/upside down
this is my luck from the sky (ie fate) that i have met you.
o my love, it is I who has loved you.
i've become happy/ comfortable, what have you done to me?
my love/darling, how many years have passed with me waiting for you.
and oh, how long and many times i've dreamt of you my love
and i see this dream with my eyes.
my love, before i met you
the world and life were not like this in my eyes
you've returned my happiness in my years/life
i never dreamt that my life would be like it is now/ where it is now
and more than this, what do i need?
in front of me is the one i wanted to meet
this is my luck from the sky (ie fate) that i have met you.
o my love, it is I who has loved you.
i've become happy/ comfortable, what have you done to me?
my love/darling, how many years have passed with me waiting for you.
and oh, how long and many times i've dreamt of you my love
and i see this dream with my eyes.
this is my luck from the sky (ie fate) that i have met you.
my love, tell me where you are/were
why all this time you have been away from me.
my love, for how many years i've waited for you
and i've dreamt of you my love for so long
and tis dream i've seen with my own eyes
ده حظى من السما ان انا لاقيتك
حبيبى دانا كام سنه فعمري مستنيك
وحلمت انا ياما يا حبيبى بيك
انا قبل ما اقابلك يا حبيبى
محلمتش عمري انا باللى انا فيه
واكتر من كده هحتاج تاني ايه
قدامى اللى انا كان نفسى الاقيه
ده حظى من السما ان انا لاقيتك
حبيبى دانا كام سنه فعمري مستنيك
وحلمت انا ياما يا حبيبى بيك
I swear it was not on my mind
That someday I will adore you
You know what happened to me
When I tried to forget you
Your breath took me away and let me in confusion and fire
I found my soul leaving with you
And my heart's day become night
One night in life beside you, one night
I couldn't forget your love for one night
And I came back to you
Again I will stay sleepless and miss you for nights again
You changed my case in one second again
My eyes on love when my eye came to me
I don't know what happened to me
How much I tried to hide it, oh how much..
But what do why do to my heart
How much it longed for you
W albi ana ba2a lelo nhar
Tani hashar w ashta2 layali tani
Bas a3mel eih f albi yama
بس اعمل ايه فى قلبى ياما
it wasn't love, so why would I have any regrets?
not a single tear will I cry over her
for she has forgotten me, my heart 1
I will never ever think about her again
and enough of tormenting my heart with her
I'll forget about her, and if she wanted to come back
my heart has had enough already
it wasn't love, it was torture
she was never my lover, my heart
forget her, my heart.. forget her, my heart
she wasted my life away and thought it was alright to hurt me
it wasn't love, so why would I have any regrets?
not a single tear will I cry over her
for she has forgotten me, my heart 1
I will never ever think about her again
ده انا قلبي فيه اللي مكفيه
ده مكنش حب ده كان تعذيب
They told me about you, I didn't believe..till I saw with my own eyes
I who never fell in love before.. fell in love with your eyes & they enchanted me
You the prettiest love I ever lived in.. I love you & you know why
Because beside you, my love I found.. all what I was dreaming of
You, more than what I ever dreamt of.. Your love, if they ever ask me about
I'll say, it's heaven I'm living in.. & why would I ever leave the heaven, why
I loved you, my heart melted in your love.. & I hope to live my life with you
& even melt more & love your eyes.. & not for a day in my lifetime, will I forget your love
They told me about you, I didn't believe..till I saw with my own eyes
I who never fell in love before.. fell in love with your eyes & they enchanted me
They told me about you, a lot they said.. & my heart didn't have it in mind
To melt in your love like that & adore.. & soon its state changes
My love, whatever they say about you.. & whatever they try- describing you
There is, in the world, no speech.. would ever describe even just your eyes' charm
You, more than what I ever dreamt of.. Your love, if they ever ask me about
I'll say, it's heaven I'm living in.. & why would I ever leave the heaven, why
I loved you, my heart melted in your love.. & I hope to live my life with you
& even melt more & love your eyes.. & not for a day in my lifetime, will I forget your love
They told me about you, I didn't believe..till I saw with my own eyes
I who never fell in love before.. fell in love with your eyes & they enchanted me
Alouly 3alek ma sada2tesh.. le7ad ma shouft b-3youny
Ya agmal hob 3esht ana feeh.. Ba7ebak w enta 3aref leeh
3ashan ganbak 7abiby la2eet.. ana kol elly ba7lam beih
Y aktar m-elly ba7lam beih.. Hawak law yes2alouny 3aleih
Ha2oul ganna ba3esh feeha. w leih m-el-ganna ha5rog leeh
3eshe2tak alby dab f hawak.. W nefsy a3esh hayaty ma3ak
Wa adoub aktar w aheb 3eneik. Wala youm 3omry hansa hawak
Alouly 3alek ma sada2tesh.. le7ad ma shouft b-3youny
Alouly 3alek kteer 2alo.. W alby ma-kansh 3ala balo
Yedoub f hawak keda w ye3sha2.. W yet3'ayyar 2awam 7alo
Habiby, mahma 2alo 3alek.. W mahma ye7oulo yewsefo feek
Mafeesh f ed-donia ayy kalam.. hayewsef 7atta se7r 3eneik
Y aktar m-elly ba7lam beih.. Hawak law yes2alouny 3aleih
Ha2oul ganna ba3esh feeha. w leih m-el-ganna ha5rog leeh
3eshe2tak alby dab f hawak.. W nefsy a3esh hayaty ma3ak
Wa adoub aktar w aheb 3eneik. Wala youm 3omry hansa hawak
Alouly 3alek ma sada2tesh.. le7ad ma shouft b-3youny

transliteration.title: Alouly Alek - They Told Me About You

lyrics.text: قالولى عليك ماصدقتش .. لحد ما شفت بعيونى
أنا اللى عمرى ماعشقتش .. عشقت عينيك و سحرونى
يا أجمل حب عشت أنا فيه .. بحبك و أنت عارف ليه
عشان جنبك حبيبى لقيت .. أنا كل اللى باحلم بيه
يا أكتر من اللى باحلم بيه .. هواك لو يسألونى عليه
هاقول جنة باعيش فيها .. و ليه من الجنة هاخرج ليه
عشقتك قلبى داب فى هواك .. و نفسى أعيش حياتى معاك
و ادوب أكتر و احب عينيك .. ولا يوم عمرى هانسى هواك
قالولى عليك ماصدقتش .. لحد ما شفت بعيونى
أنا اللى عمرى ماعشقتش .. عشقت عينيك و سحرونى
قالولى عليك كتير قالوا .. و قلبى ماكنش على باله
يدوب فى هواك كدة و يعشق ..و يتغير أوام حاله
حبيبى مهما قالوا عليك .. و مهما يحاولوا يوصفوا فيك
مافيش فى الدنيا أى كلام .. هايوصف حتى سحر عينيك
يا أكتر من اللى باحلم بيه .. هواك لو يسألونى عليه
هاقول جنة باعيش فيها .. و ليه من الجنة هاخرج ليه
عشقتك قلبى داب فى هواك .. و نفسى أعيش حياتى معاك
و ادوب أكتر و احب عينيك .. ولا يوم عمرى هانسى هواك
قالولى عليك ماصدقتش .. لحد ما شفت بعيونى
أنا اللى عمرى ماعشقتش .. عشقت عينيك و سحرونى
wasn't i enough pathetic to you
when i came to you one day crying and when i called you
or when i complained a lot about you being away from me
when i told that i loved and that i was suffering away from you
or when i ended in front of your eyes
i wasn't pathetic enough to you
Yaah lildaraga dy tba3ed 3ady we tewada3ni
Yaah keda besholah mesh ma32oola inta tba3ni
Ma32ool youm lamma edee3 yeb2a bedeek
wasn't i enough pathetic to you
when i came to you one day crying and when i called you
or when i complained a lot about you being away from me
when i told that i loved and that i was suffering away from you
or when i ended in front of your eyes
i wasn't pathetic enough to you
معقول يوم لما اضيع يبقي بأيديك؟
Before your eyes, I will live
the sweetest years of the rest of my life
And I would die of fear for you
if you were away from my eyes for a second
I will live my days for you
And start my life all over for you
I will stay with you till the last day of my life
I have been calling for you for nights
And even when you're with me I miss you
And in your love, I dream to
There is no lover for me other than you
And no one that I can tell what's in my heart,
no one who could be as close to me
and sense what I feel before I tell her
I wish we could run away
to the paradise we have always dreamt of
We would live together once again
And our dream would come true in it
احكيله عن اللى فى قلبى كله
ويحس بيا من غير ما اقوله
when i first saw you, my heart asked me a question
it asked me, was this the truth/ reality or was it imagination..
what i am seeing is standing there
i couldnt stop my heart, it started and continued to call for you
i was comfortable with him, and it showed in his eyes
this is the most beautiful of coincidents
and i say, i hope that what i am oin will last
and that i stay with you, and in you for all time
for when you are around, in me is life my love/darling
you are the one with whom my heart became rested/comfortable/ happy when i found you
i wanted my days to be with you, and no one else will be ok for me
i will never leave you, my life/love, and why would i (leave you)?
for where will i find love like this, you've become a part of me!
اللى انا فيه ده ياريته يطول
